Different Crime.Crime Name: Failure to provide required documentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
procedural_fairness: Officer did not deny procedural fairness
evidence_assessment: Applicant failed to submit UK tax documents despite reminders
legal_basis: Under IRPA, applicants must provide all relevant documents. Officers can deny permits if inadmissibility is suspected

Different Crime.Crime Name: Potential inadmissibility due to possible tax evasion offense under Income Tax Act
procedural_fairness: officer reasonably required UK tax returns
evidence_provided: Applicant failed to submit UK tax returns
